医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
无袖监测仪为高血压管理带来希望布里格姆研究人员领导的一项研究评估了一种新型设备，该设备可以自动测量手腕血压，在几天内生成数百个读数，可以帮助临床医生确定心血管风险并改善高血压护理https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Cuffless-monitor-offers-promise-for-hypertension-management.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Cuffless-monitor-offers-promise-for-hypertension-management.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=80b08ed7-5e30-4168-a1a4-ced08b1562be Wed, 26 Jun 2024 10:49:30 -0400 Cuffless monitor offers promise for hypertension management
CSF1R 标记物可用于巨噬细胞激活嵌合体的研究巨噬细胞通过抵抗感染和帮助组织修复在免疫系统中发挥着关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/CSF1R-marker-enables-study-of-Macrophage-Activation-Mosaicism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/CSF1R-marker-enables-study-of-Macrophage-Activation-Mosaicism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d350feb9-76b8-4c26-88bc-f4f4c235e76c Wed, 26 Jun 2024 10:32:08 -0400 CSF1R marker enables study of Macrophage Activation Mosaicism
最近的研究发现降血糖药物对痴呆风险的有效性存在差异研究人员比较了抗糖尿病药物在降低老年糖尿病患者患痴呆症风险方面的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Differences-in-effectness-among-antihyperglycemic-drugs-on-dementia-risk-identified-in-recent-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Differences-in-effectness-among-antihyperglycemic-drugs-on-dementia-risk-identified-in-recent-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=164cc85d-8da9-4c5c-9b64-74093dcf1a52 Wed, 26 Jun 2024 10:30:00 -0400 Differences in effectiveness among antihyperglycemic drugs on dementia risk identified in recent study
Scale Biosciences 宣布推出 ScalePlex 技术，以简化任何规模的单细胞基因组学研究新颖的多重技术可实现无缝样品池，从而促进用于化合物筛选和转化研究的经济高效的单细胞实验。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Scale-Biosciences-announces-ScalePlex-technology-to-simplify-single-cell-genomics-studies-of-any-scale.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Scale-Biosciences-announces-ScalePlex-technology-to-simplify-single-cell-genomics-studies-of-any-scale.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bcc71e7c-6166-4063-94f6-329eb88d2e45 Wed, 26 Jun 2024 10:16:00 -0400 Scale Biosciences announces ScalePlex technology to simplify single cell genomics studies of any scale
研究人员发现阿尔茨海默病血脑屏障功能障碍的分子特征血脑屏障 -;血管和组织网络，滋养大脑并保护大脑免受血液中循环的有害物质的影响；在阿尔茨海默病中被破坏。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Researchers-uncover-molecular-signatures-of-blood-brain-barrier-dysfunction-in-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Researchers-uncover-molecular-signatures-of-blood-brain-barrier-dysfunction-in-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0075171b-d83a-4b98-8608-a9b276d453a1 Wed, 26 Jun 2024 10:10:37 -0400 Researchers uncover molecular signatures of blood-brain barrier dysfunction in Alzheimer's disease
母亲使用手机与婴儿言语发育下降有关研究表明，手机的使用可能会影响儿童的言语输入和语言发展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Maternal-cell-phone-use-linked-with-decrease-in-infants-speech-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Maternal-cell-phone-use-linked-with-decrease-in-infants-speech-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=958d5b52-7ab7-4970-a4c4-89249ccdd657 Wed, 26 Jun 2024 10:04:01 -0400 Maternal cell phone use associated with decrease in infants' speech development
加州 25 美元的医疗保健时薪依赖于联邦补贴和州工人豁免加州领先全国的卫生工作者 25 美元最低工资将依赖联邦资金的大幅增加，并根据一项预计将在未来几天获得批准的协议免除数千名州雇员的工资。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Californiae28099S-2425-health-care-hourly-wage-relies-on-federal-boost-state-worker-exemption.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Californiae28099S-2425-health-care-hourly-wage-relies-on-federal-boost-state-worker-exemption.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=24602fa8-e3a9-410a-887d-3204a4a6d94d Wed, 26 Jun 2024 06:51:00 -0400 California’s $25 health care hourly wage relies on federal boost, state worker exemption
研究发现服用索马鲁肽的女性平均体重减轻量比男性多研究人员对索马鲁肽对肥胖和心力衰竭患者的治疗效果进行了二次分析，该计划采用保留的左心室射血分数计划，其中包括糖尿病患者，并按生物性别分层。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Study-finds-women-lost-more-of-their-body-weight-on-average-with-semaglutide-than-men.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Study-finds-women-lost-more-of-their-body-weight-on-average-with-semaglutide-than-men.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a4fd5f92-2511-4f5b-8989-c98c14d1b6cf Wed, 26 Jun 2024 05:58:00 -0400 Study finds women lost more of their body weight on average with semaglutide than men
黑色素瘤消息：社交媒体是皮肤癌交流的有用工具研究人员评估了有效教育公众并提高进行皮肤检查意愿的健康传播信息。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Melanoma-messages-Social-media-a-useful-tool-for-skin-cancer-communication.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Melanoma-messages-Social-media-a-useful-tool-for-skin-cancer-communication.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f5b2e9c5-f6c5-4fdd-aa0e-40abe0e0706c Wed, 26 Jun 2024 05:15:00 -0400 Melanoma messages: Social media a useful tool for skin cancer communication
Sapio Sciences 推出 Sapio GMP LIMS，为独特的制造工艺提供无与伦比的灵活性Sapio Sciences 宣布其高度灵活、无代码/低代码 LIMS 的关键新功能，以支持必须遵守 GMP、21 CFR 11 和欧盟附件 11 标准的实验室。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Sapio-Sciences-introduces-Sapio-GMP-LIMS-offering-unmatched-flexibility-for-unique-manufacturing-processes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Sapio-Sciences-introduces-Sapio-GMP-LIMS-offering-unmatched-flexibility-for-unique-manufacturing-processes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8b10e0aa-0976-443a-98c2-1fd422c86863 Wed, 26 Jun 2024 04:58:00 -0400 Sapio Sciences introduces Sapio GMP LIMS offering unmatched flexibility for unique manufacturing processes
